Hero.title: Your website is your 24/7 sales team
Hero.description: We build high-converting websites that work while you sleep. SEO-optimized, lightning-fast, and designed to turn visitors into customers.

seo.title: SEO That Delivers
seo.description: Our websites rank. We've generated 25,000+ monthly visits for clients through strategic SEO optimization.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Sub-second load times. Because every second of delay costs you 7% in conversions.

sales.title: Built to Convert
sales.description: Your website isn't a brochure—it's your hardest-working salesperson, closing deals around the clock.

Services.heading: What We Build
Services.description: Websites that don't just look good—they perform. Every pixel is designed to drive results.

customDev.title: Selling Websites
customDev.description: Conversion-focused websites that turn traffic into revenue. Your 24/7 digital sales machine.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform apps that keep your customers engaged on the go.

web.title: Web Applications
web.description: Fast, scalable web apps built with modern tech. Optimized for speed and SEO from day one.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: User journeys designed to convert. Beautiful interfaces that guide visitors to take action.

Projects.heading: Selected Work
Projects.description: Real results for real businesses. See what we've built for our clients.

items.edux: Educational platform with optimized user experience and strong organic traffic.
items.epixrent: Car rental platform with instant booking—designed to convert browsers into renters.
items.arbicho: International Chemistry Olympiad platform reaching thousands of participants globally.
items.gradabroad: Study abroad platform helping students discover international opportunities.
items.trapo: 3D streetwear customization platform with real-time preview and seamless checkout.
items.khimio: International Math & Informatics Olympiad platform with high engagement rates.
items.namanganCarRent: Car rental platform with Telegram bot integration for instant booking in Namangan region.
items.integerAcademy: Educational academy platform for programming and IT courses with modern learning experience.
items.icho2026: Official website for the 58th International Chemistry Olympiad hosted in Uzbekistan.

About.heading: About <brand>TechnOne</brand>
About.intro: We're not just developers—we're growth partners. Based in Tashkent, we build websites that generate real business results for clients worldwide.

story.p1: We've helped businesses achieve 25,000+ monthly visits through strategic SEO. Our websites load in under a second. But what matters most? They convert visitors into customers, working for you 24/7.

Contact.heading: Let's Build Something That Sells
Contact.description: Ready for a website that works as hard as you do?
Contact.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
